October 6th, 2017:
- Added 'virtual_sections' section in ranges.json
July 1st, 2017:
- Added 'leds' field in 'General' section
-- Set to the number of leds that you have connected. Usually a multiple of 30
- Added 'pin' field in 'General' section
-- Set to the pin number that the data line is connected to. Usually 18
